introduction: For me, programming started as a hobby, playing around with simple things. Soon enough, I realized, that I was spending more and more time doing just that. It was consuming. I could spend hours doing it, and at this point I understood ... I wanted to pursue this further, seek deeper.
follow_up: Now, after education in full-stack web development, I am emerging as a junior developer, ready to take on new challenges. Even though, I am a junior in web development, I do bring a lot of experience in teamwork, work ethic, communication as well as responsibility, adaptability, loyalty and eagerness to deepen my knowledge. I am excited to see where this journey will take me.
